questions.questionText: A telephone caller reports a woman lying in the gutter bleeding. Choose the priority of this situation.

options.text: Priority 1 - An immediate threat to life or health
Priority 2 - An immediate threat to property
Priority 3 - A routine report or incident
Priority 4 - A public service or public education

questions.questionText: Woman says her 17 year old daughter has run away for the fifth time this month. Choose the priority of this situation.

Priority 3 - A routine report or incident
Priority 4 - A public service or public education
